description.originalText:
Makayla was our dear family nanny. I would describe her as compassionate, punctual, a great communicator, and truly the best nanny our family could have chosen. She watched my five children (5-17). She managed all home duties and assisted me during the day while my children were at school. She helped keep my house organized, she up kept all cleaning, she did all of our laundry, she meal prepped our meals, and would run all needed errands.
She would then pick up all kids from school.
She would prepare their daily snacks and daily dinners for our family. She maintained the children's routines and coordinated everyone's extra curricular activities. She was truly a blessing to our family. We are forever grateful for our time with us. Her and her son will both always be near and dear to our family.

I am writing to highly recommend Makayla. I have had the privilege of working closely
with her while she was our nanny. She demonstrated exceptional qualities that I believe
would make her a valuable asset to any family.
She consistently exhibited efficiency, care, empathy, and an impressive sense of
responsibility. During her time working with my family, her ability to care for both of my
children was nothing short of remarkable. She organized and planned their activities, meals, and
nap schedules flawlessly, ensuring a harmonious and productive environment for everyone. Her
attention to detail and timeliness were invaluable, as she was always punctual and dependable.
What stood out most was her natural ability to combine her efficiency with genuine
empathy. She approached every task with patience and understanding, making my children feel
comfortable and cared for at all times. Her tenacity in ensuring that their needs were met, without
ever compromising on quality, truly impressed me.
I have no doubt that she will bring these same qualities of dedication, care, and efficiency to
any role she pursues. She is a quick learner, an excellent communicator, and a dependable team
member. I wholeheartedly recommend her for the position at your company and am confident
she will make significant contributions to your family.

Makayla did not show as scheduled, with zero communication or explanation. She seemed professional prior to thisâ€”she even confirmed with me on the day before! After the no show, she would not answer calls/texts. Very bizarre, do not try to schedule with her.
